item.title: @elonmusk: This was amazing. When I got off the operating table, I could already tell that I was able to see, w...
item.description: This was amazing. When I got off the operating table, I could already tell that I was able to see, with a bit of haziness. When I woke up from a short nap a few hours later, I could see everything very clearly. My eyes aren't dry, I don't feel any pain. I love modern medicine!

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk: "As a kid, I read a lot of science fiction fantasy books, and comic books. And I always l...
item.description: Elon Musk: "As a kid, I read a lot of science fiction fantasy books, and comic books. And I always liked technology I didn't expect to be where I am today; that seems incredibly implausible. I was inspired by reading books about the future, about science fiction. And I guess I want to make science fiction not fiction forever. At some point, turn science fiction to science fact."

item.title: @elonmusk: Just started Tesla Robotaxi drives in Austin with no safety monitor in the car. Congrats to the@Tesl...
item.description: Just started Tesla Robotaxi drives in Austin with no safety monitor in the car. Congrats to the@Tesla_AIteam! If you‚Äôre interested in solving real-world AI, which is likely to lead to AGI imo, join Tesla AI. Solving real-world AI for Optimus will be 100X harder than cars.

item.title: @elonmusk: Great to finally welcome@elonmuskto#Davos. His conversation with Larry Fink on AI, robotics and the ...
item.description: Great to finally welcome@elonmuskto#Davos. His conversation with Larry Fink on AI, robotics and the future of technology reflected both ambition and optimism about what lies ahead. Innovation is moving fast, and with the right leadership and collaboration, it can be a powerful force for progress.#wef26

item.title: @elonmusk: Robotaxi rides without any safety monitors are now publicly available in Austin. Starting with a few...
item.description: Robotaxi rides without any safety monitors are now publicly available in Austin. Starting with a few unsupervised vehicles mixed in with the broader robotaxi fleet with safety monitors, and the ratio will increase over time.

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: "I'd like to understand the meaning of life. Is the standard model of physics correct reg...
item.description: ELON MUSK: "I'd like to understand the meaning of life. Is the standard model of physics correct regarding the beginning of existence & the end of the universe? What questions do we not know to ask that we should ask? AI will help us with these things."
